comments.comment: I am using Bajaj Pulsar NS160 Bike and I am very happy with its performance. I recommend this bike to others also who are looking for good sports bike in low budget. This bike offers a good speed with comfort and safety.
Looking super, beautifully designed, good effort by the company gives long driving confidence, handling is superb, pick up is mind-blowing.
Excellent bike youngers are well satisfied with the model. Very slim and weightless which will give great performance and mileage also is good.
aIts style, sound, and performance are extraordinary. Anyone planning to purchase a new bike. I suggested only ns 160.
Around 3 Months Back I Bought This Pulsar NS160 Bike which Gives the Best Driving Experience without any Discomfort, On-road as well as offroad.

I am Using This Bike for the last 6 months and I am impressed with Its Amazing Performance. After all Its Delivering Good Mileage and Suspension. The Best Thing About This Bike is Its Comfortable Seat with a Smooth Drive Experience.
I purchased Bajaj Pulsar NS160 Bike because it offers many features and it comes at an affordable price. I am very happy to buy this bike. I am using it for the daily commute and long rides.
